title: Open Call Configuration Schema
description: Schema for validating open-call.json files used in Photo Open Call Analyzer. See ADR-007: Configuration Validation Schema.

theme.description: Photography theme or subject description for this competition

items.description: Name or title of jury member

jury.description: List of jury members (their names, roles, or affiliations)

pastWinners.description: Description of past winning photos and their characteristics (style, themes, technical quality)

context.description: Optional additional context for evaluation (e.g., competition mission, special focus areas)

customCriteria.description: Optional: Custom evaluation criteria (if not provided, AI generates from theme/jury)
